definitions.title: n. pr. m.
definitions.body: (cf. [[עמס]], [[ענשׂ]] ? or read [[עַמִּשַׂי]] (II. [[עַם]] + [[יִשַׂי]]), We:Isr. u. Jüd. Gesch. 24, cf. Gray Prop. N. 44, 323);—
Absalom's general 2Sa 17:25, 2Sa 17:25, 2Sa 19:14 + 8 t. 2Sa 20, 1Ki 2:5, 1Ki 2:32, 1Ch 2:17, 1Ch 2:17, LXX Amess(a)ei, LXXL Amessa.
